name: Five Nights At 3
description:
(Warning! - May lag on some devices.)

The final installment in the "Five Nights at" series!  

Five Nights At is a semi - ironic fnaf - themed space shooter based off an inside joke between me and my friends.

(Play the sequell here!: https://flyingpiggles10.itch.io/five-nights-at-2)

(Play the original here!: https://flyingpiggles10.itch.io/five-nights-at-uh-what )

You're sent on a mission to stop a space parasite when things go a bit wrong. Will circus baby be able to defeat the foes that stand in her way? Probably not, but gosh darn it will she try.

Controls - 

WASD To move

Space to shoot

Mouse to aim

Z to continue text 

When "Super" Meter is full, press x to activate, aim with your mouse, then x again to fire.

Avoid the bullets!

Songs used (In order) - 

Carpenter Brut - Le perv

DELTARUNE OST - THE WORLD REVOLVING

DELTARUNE OST - Chaos king

Sfx are from Undertale, Fnaf 3, Deltarune, and Windows 95.
